name: spacewise
description: Web application for reserving seats in libraries and co-working spaces

scripts.build-db: sqlite3 database.db < db_schema.sql # build a new database from the sql file
scripts.init-dummy-data: sqlite3 database.db < db_dummy_data.sql # insert dummy data into the database
scripts.clean-db: rm database.db # remove the old database
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run clean-db && npm run build-db # rebuild the database without dummy data
scripts.rebuild-db-dummy: npm run clean-db && npm run build-db && npm run init-dummy-data # rebuild the database with dummy data
scripts.clean-db-win: del database.db # remove the old database (windows)
scripts.rebuild-db-win: npm run clean-db-win && npm run build-db # rebuild the database without dummy data
scripts.rebuild-db-dummy-win: npm run clean-db-win && npm run build-db && npm run init-dummy-data # rebuild the database with dummy data

author: SpaceWise Team
